Text: The company had revenue of $64.68 million during the quarter, compared to analyst estimates of $64.51 million. During the same period in the previous year, the business earned $0.73 earnings per share. The firm's quarterly revenue was down 3.9% compared to the same quarter last year.
Cause: The firm's quarterly revenue was down 3.9% compared to the same quarter last year.
Effect: The company had revenue of $64.68 million during the quarter, compared to analyst estimates of $64.51 million.
Sentence: <e2>The company had revenue of $64.68 million during the quarter, compared to analyst estimates of $64.51 million.</e2> During the same period in the previous year, the business earned $0.73 earnings per share. <e1>The firm's quarterly revenue was down 3.9% compared to the same quarter last year.</e1>
